WorkItem.Description:
Japanese(or multi-bytes) characters in template are garbled.
 
Reproduce Code:
var result = Razor.Parse(@"私の名前は @Model.Value です。", new { Value = "飾利" }); // Japanese chars in Razor Template
------------------------------
Expected Output:
私の名前は 飾利 です。
------------------------------
Actual Output:
????? 飾利 ???
------------------------------
WorkItem.Summary: Japanese(or multi-bytes) characters in template are garbled.
